metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper input validation for some Intel(R) PROSet/Wireless WiFi, Intel vPro(R) CSME WiFi and Killer(TM) WiFi products may allow unauthenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> It is not clear in the advisory whether updated firmware, or updated drivers are required to fix this issue, or where they are available.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
